results.title: Association of poor sleep and HbA1c in metformin-treated patients with type 2 diabetes: Findings from the UK Biobank cohort study.
results.text_hl: Association of @<m>DISEASE_Sleep_Wake_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012893 @@@poor sleep@@@ and HbA1c in @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@-treated @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes@@@: Findings from the UK Biobank cohort study.

citations.NLM: Xue P, Tan X, Benedict C. Association of poor sleep and HbA1c in metformin-treated patients with type 2 diabetes: Findings from the UK Biobank cohort study. J Sleep Res. 2023 Apr 27;():e13917. PMID: 37106473

results.title: Sleep behavior and daily activity levels in people with metabolic syndrome: effect of 1 year of metformin treatment
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ (@GENE_SLTM @GENE_79811 @@@MET@@@), an @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@ sensitizer drug, is effective in regressing @DISEASE_Metabolic_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D024821 @@@MS@@@ and has been recently studied as an adjuvant agent for managing @<m>DISEASE_Sleep_Wake_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012893 @@@sleep disorders@@@.

citations.NLM: Bruno E, Mulè A, Galasso L, Castelli L, Baldassari I, Oliverio A, Venturelli E, Berrino F, Montaruli A, Roveda E, Pasanisi P. Sleep behavior and daily activity levels in people with metabolic syndrome: effect of 1 year of metformin treatment Front Nutr. 2023;10():1240762. PMID: 37829735

results.title: Hyperglycemia in pregnancy: sleep alterations, comorbidities and pharmacotherapy.
results.text_hl: Interestingly, only in @DISEASE_Diabetes_Gestational @DISEASE_MESH:D016640 @@@gestational diabetes mellitus@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ therapy and higher parity were associated with @<m>DISEASE_Sleep_Wake_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012893 @@@poor sleep quality@@@.

citations.NLM: Façanha C, Bruin V, Bruin P, Façanha A, Rocha HC, Araujo M, Forti A, Macêdo R. Hyperglycemia in pregnancy: sleep alterations, comorbidities and pharmacotherapy. Rev Assoc Med Bras (1992). 2021 Jan;67(1):45-51. PMID: 34161489

results.title: Novel Insights Into Monogenic Obesity Syndrome Due to INPP5E Gene Variant: A Case Report of a Female Patient
results.text_hl: The @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ is managed by regular nutritional advice, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, antihypertensive medication, and non-invasive respiratory support during @<m>DISEASE_Sleep_Wake_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012893 @@@sleep@@@.

results.title: The relationship between metformin therapy and sleep quantity and quality in patients with Type 2 diabetes referred for potential sleep disorders.
results.text_hl: The relationship between @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ therapy and sleep quantity and quality in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@Type 2 diabetes@@@ referred for potential @<m>DISEASE_Sleep_Wake_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012893 @@@sleep disorders@@@.

results.title: AMPK Phosphorylation Modulates Pain by Activation of NLRP3 Inflammasome.
results.text_hl: Deficient @GENE_PRKAA2 @GENE_5563 @@@AMPK@@@ activation and overactivation of @GENE_DFNA34 @GENE_114548 @@@NLRP3@@@ inflammasome axis were also observed in blood cells from @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Fibromyalgia @DISEASE_MESH:D005356 @@@fibromyalgia@@@ (@DISEASE_Fibromyalgia @DISEASE_MESH:D005356 @@@FM@@@), a prevalent @SPECIES_9606 @@@human@@@ @DISEASE_Chronic_Pain @DISEASE_MESH:D059350 @@@chronic pain disease@@@. In addition, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment (200 mg/daily), which increased @GENE_PRKAA2 @GENE_5563 @@@AMPK@@@ activation, restored all biochemical alterations examined by us in blood cells and significantly improved clinical symptoms, such as, @DISEASE_Pain @DISEASE_MESH:D010146 @@@pain@@@, @DISEASE_Fatigue @DISEASE_MESH:D005221 @@@fatigue@@@, @DISEASE_Depressive_Disorder @DISEASE_MESH:D003866 @@@depression@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Sleep_Wake_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012893 @@@disturbed sleep@@@, and tender @DISEASE_Belonephobia @DISEASE_MESH:C000719195 @@@points@@@, in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Fibromyalgia @DISEASE_MESH:D005356 @@@FM@@@.

citations.NLM: Bullón P, Alcocer-Gómez E, Carrión AM, Marín-Aguilar F, Garrido-Maraver J, Román-Malo L, Ruiz-Cabello J, Culic O, Ryffel B, Apetoh L, Ghiringhelli F, Battino M, Sánchez-Alcazar JA, Cordero MD. AMPK Phosphorylation Modulates Pain by Activation of NLRP3 Inflammasome. Antioxid Redox Signal. 2016 Jan 20;24(3):157-70. PMID: 26132721
